subject: Baseball
Tropicana Field (St Petersburg, Fla)
lead_paragraph: The Tampa Bay Rays are legally obligated to play in St. Petersburg, Fla., for another 15 years, and it will not let the team leave without a fight.
snippet: The Tampa Bay Rays are legally obligated to play in St. Petersburg, Fla., for another 15 years, and it will not let the team leave without a fight.
